dewanuwa nawa nirdeshayen shuddha ganithaya ha wyawaharika ganithaya wani atham wishaya iwathkara sanyuktha ganithaya wani wishaya ekathu kara thibima ya. 2001 di ee nohakiyawa hethuwen sangahana eekarashi nokale yayi upakalpanaya kirimata nohakke adala pudgalayan ada ee sambandhayen dakwana wirodhathawa salakillata ganime di ya. 2001 di sangahana eekarashi kirima harennata shishya sangahana athara dakshathawa sambandhayen wu wenasa salakillata ganna wenath kramayak wuwa da yojana nowini yayi sithami. 2011 wasare di da nawa niradeshayata ha parani nirdeshayata peni siti shishya sangahana athara dakshatha athin wenasak weyi.

dumriya enjimak maha ra riyaduru nathiwa rathmalanata yayi rupiyal koti ataka kiri-piti pakat 260,000k siduwe gabadawakin allayi kiripiti mila wadi kara ganna thoga hannga boru kiyanna epa aya waya wiwadayata wipakshaye kathikayan na ostreliyawe sankramana nithi thawa thawath dadi weyi ran abarana pannimata giya kathun 3k dale rajarata sarasawiye sisun 22kata wasaraka athhita wu sira danduwam behethwala dina wenas karana hora jawaramak watalayi jathika poshana prathipaththiya monaragala di ada eli daki okten 92 petral janawariye sita rata pura lingika allas illu sarayange wada thahanam sirakaruwakuta thahanam bhanda denna giyayi 13 thek rimand kotasara wehere budu pilimaya samanga athurudan himi namage sirura soya gani gutibata huwamaruwakin pasu kosthapal athulu dedenek rohale sabaragamu pariwenadhipathiwaru janapathita thuthi pudathi lekamthumage honda hitha araganna ritigala piramin sewwa pruthagjana abhyawakasha thakshanaya pilibanda pas awurudu salasma kriyathmaka kirime palamu niyamu rata shri lankawa basgasthu wadi karana sanshodhana soya balimata nithipathiwarayata usawi ennayi nothisi nikuth kere mahajana saukhya heda usas wimata erehiwa pawul saukhya sewa niladhariniyange wirodhathawa asadharanayi me rate thunwana balawegayak hadanna giya hama kenama khedawachakayakata goduru wuna hora nottuwalin kasino gasu apakaru usawi nawata warenthu muwamas langa thabagaththata dada laksha 26k watina rupiyal wisihaya laksha wisipan dahasak watina nima nokala ran abarana thogayak indiyawata ragena yamata uthsaha kala kanthawan thidenaku eeye aluyama ath adanguwata gath bawa reguwa kiyayi.
